tools.title: Tools
tools.a4_desc:
Normalizes all pages to A4 format.

• Preserves content proportions
• Adds white margins (letterboxing)
• Ideal for printing and archiving
tools.a4_success:
All pages have been normalized to A4.
Remember to save the document.
tools.compression_desc:
Optimizes PDF file size.

• Garbage collection (removes unused objects)
• Stream compression (deflate)
• Structure cleaning
tools.nup_desc:
Places multiple pages on one sheet.
Ideal for reviewing or saving paper.

security.title: Security
security.scrub_desc:
Removes all metadata from document:
• Author
• Title
• Creation date
• Modification date
• Producer
• Keywords
• XMP metadata
security.scrub_confirm:
Are you sure you want to remove all metadata?

This operation is irreversible.
security.scrub_success:
Metadata has been removed.
Remember to save the document.
security.flatten_desc:
Flattens interactive elements:
• PDF forms
• Annotations
• Comments

After flattening, elements become
part of the page and cannot be edited.
security.flatten_confirm:
Are you sure you want to flatten the document?

Forms and annotations will become non-editable.
This operation is irreversible.
security.flatten_success:
Document has been flattened.
Remember to save the document.

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.preflight_desc:
Detects potential issues:
• Empty pages
• Low resolution images
• Broken links
analysis.tables_desc:
Extracts tables from document.
Export to CSV or copy to Excel.

automation.title: Automation
automation.bookmarks_desc:
Automatically generates table of contents
based on detected headings.

Algorithm analyzes font size
to determine heading hierarchy:
• 24pt+ → Level 1
• 18-24pt → Level 2
• 14-18pt → Level 3
automation.detect_success:
Detected {count} headings.
Review the list and click 'Generate bookmarks'.
automation.generate_success:
Bookmarks have been generated.
Remember to save the document.
